alert.note: Alert for Inland Cameron; Southern Hidalgo (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 7:58PM CST until January 21 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO NOON CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Sleet will be possible. Light icing could result in slippery conditions on sidewalks, with icing possible on overpasses, bridges/flyaways, and other elevated surfaces during the morning commute on Friday. Wind chills could range from around 25 above zero to 30 above zero. * WHERE...Southern Hidalgo and Inland Cameron Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM to noon CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute Friday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Residents should continue to closely monitor this developing winter weather situation.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
